text: Logon, Tumse pehle ki qaumon ko ( jo apne apne zamane mein bar sar e urooj thi) humne halaak kardiya jab unhon ne zulm ki rawish ikhtiyar ki aur unke Rasool unke paas khuli khuli nishaniyan lekar aaye aur unhon ne iman laa kar hi na diya. Is tarah hum mujreemon ko unke jarayim (crime) ka badla diya karte hain
